LandingPage.title: Where skills meet needs
LandingPage.subtitle: Meet your service needs with Jobonic
LandingPage.offerYourServices: Offer your services at Jobonic at no cost!

AboutPage.description: As a proud subsidiary of our parent company, Laconic, we carry forward the legacy of making professional interactions straightforward and smooth. "Laconic" refers to a concise expression. Here at Jobonic, we embody the simplicity in matching collaborations between skills and needs.
AboutPage.description_two: In today's world, shopping for products has been so covenient, with all ecommerce platforms at your fingertips. As for services? It's not as simple. To hire a freelancer, one has to go through long texts in contracts, terms and agreements. We want to make this process laconic -- simple and seamless.
AboutPage.shopping_services: Shopping for services ought to be as convenient as shopping for products! Same goes for offering services!
AboutPage.understand_employer: Understand what your employer is looking for.
AboutPage.select_skills: Select your relevant skills and experience that meet their needs.
AboutPage.highlight_work: Highlight relevant past work and provide a clear plan for how you will complete the project.
AboutPage.maintain_communication: Maintain regular communication with your employer.
AboutPage.provide_updates: Provide updates, ask for feedback, make necessary edits.
AboutPage.release_payment: Upon completion, Jobonic will release payment to you.
AboutPage.ask_experience: Ask about their experience and skills.
AboutPage.understand_background: Understand their background, past projects, and skills.
AboutPage.make_payment: Make payment for their services and Jobonic will hold onto the payment until the service provider completes the work.
AboutPage.when_you_approve: When you approve of the work, Jobonic will release payment to the freelancer.
AboutPage.respond_in_48: If you do not respond in 48 hours, Jobonic will automatically release payment to the freelancer.
AboutPage.register_now: Register for an account today and start shopping for services.
